starting_location.plaintext: East Slopes of Mont Automnequi , Fontaine

substeps.plaintext: Enter the Mysterious Ruins and descend to the lower floor.
substeps.markdown: Enter the Mysterious Ruins and descend to the lower floor.

substeps.plaintext: The following steps can be done in any order:
substeps.markdown: The following steps can be done in any order:

substeps.plaintext: Connect the left-hand Energy Flow device:
substeps.markdown: Connect the left-hand Energy Flow device:

substeps.plaintext: Enter the Looking Glass and light the two unlit torches in the room, then exit the Looking Glass.
substeps.markdown: Enter the ◀Looking Glass▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Looking_Glass▷ and light the two unlit torches in the room, then exit the Looking Glass.

substeps.plaintext: Call the Lift to the current floor and release the Energy Flow from the other device on this floor.
substeps.markdown: Call the Lift to the current floor and release the Energy Flow from the other device on this floor.

substeps.plaintext: Continue past the device and pick up the  Special Key on the windowsill.
substeps.markdown: Continue past the device and pick up the <img:special_key> ◀Special Key▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Special_Key▷ on the windowsill.

substeps.plaintext: Connect the Energy Flow device straight ahead:
substeps.markdown: Connect the Energy Flow device straight ahead:

substeps.plaintext: Take the Lift down and enter the underwater area.
substeps.markdown: Take the Lift down and enter the underwater area.

substeps.plaintext: Enter the next chamber by activating the mechanism.
substeps.markdown: Enter the next chamber by activating the mechanism.

substeps.plaintext: Enter the left-hand chamber by activating the mechanism, then use the Xenochromatic Jellyfish trigger the mechanism again.
substeps.markdown: Enter the left-hand chamber by activating the mechanism, then use the Xenochromatic Jellyfish trigger the mechanism again.

substeps.plaintext: Release the Energy Flow. This will cause the surrounding area to become dry land.
substeps.markdown: Release the Energy Flow. This will cause the surrounding area to become dry land.

substeps.plaintext: Take the Lift up and release the Energy Flow.
substeps.markdown: Take the Lift up and release the Energy Flow.

substeps.plaintext: Return to the upper floor and use the  Special Key to open the door to the last Energy Flow device.
substeps.markdown: Return to the upper floor and use the <img:special_key> ◀Special Key▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Special_Key▷ to open the door to the last Energy Flow device.

substeps.plaintext: Go down and release the Energy Flow.
substeps.markdown: Go down and release the Energy Flow.
